def:
[ə'bændən]
n.放纵
v.放纵
v.放弃

[1:放纵]carefree, freedom from constraint 例:added spices to the stew with complete abandon
[2:放纵]to give (oneself) over unrestrainedly 例:abandon oneself to emotion
[3:放弃]to withdraw from often in the face of danger or encroachment 例:abandon the ship/homes
[4:停止做某事]to put an end to (something planned or previously agreed to) 例:the bad weather forced NASA to abandon the launch

[ə'bes]

[ə'bæʃ]
